pr_title: Return OUTSIDE_SERVICE_PERIOD for transit trips outside the data validity

timeline.bodyText: Use List.of(...) and not Collections.singletonList(...). I know you just copied the code, so maybe update the existing code as well. This is an old code smell, but to make OTP a better place we try to improve a little for every PR.
timeline.author: t2gran

timeline.bodyText: This error is because the request.dateTime is outside the service period, so we should return a constant(enum) for that even if it is just one possibility. Add DATE_TIME to InputField and call the constructor of RoutingError with that.
